channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading

item.title: Aisuru Botnet Shifts from DDoS to Residential Proxies

item.title: Windows 11 KB5067036 update rolls out Administrator Protection feature
item.description: ​​Microsoft has released the KB5067036 preview cumulative update for Windows 11 24H2 and 25H2, which begins the rollout of the Administrator Protection cybersecurity feature and an updated Start Menu....

item.title: New Herodotus Android malware fakes human typing to avoid detection
